duties_responsibilities.duty: Assess, manage, and improve supplier performance through qualification, selection, accountability, and continuous improvement.
Serve as focal point between suppliers and internal functions, communicating requirements and owning supplier accountability.
Perform on-site supplier audits and issue Supplier Corrective Action Reports (SCARs) as necessary.
Collaborate with engineering, quality, and other functions to resolve supplier issues.
Partner with suppliers to improve lead times and product quality.
Execute supplier qualification processes to assess quality, capacity, capability, and cost.
Assess supplier risks, identify secondary and tertiary suppliers, and manage supply chain risk.
Track and communicate supplier on-time delivery and quality metrics to suppliers and internal stakeholders.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in engineering, supply chain management, or related field (Master's preferred)
